replies.body: woah that nami skin actually looks like one of her best skins
Really? Feels incredibly lackluster if you ask me :/
Besides the amazing recall, it looks like a chroma of river spirit with more red tones.

The recall is nice.
But the model and VFX are very lacking atm.
Tbh I think all of these skins problems could be solved if they were repriced.
Screw the skins, have you seen the kkoma ward? It's the only ward skin that i might consider buying, who wouldnt want a mini kkoma looking out for you with that cute animation
